hypothesis_content.title: Momentum Exhaustion Gap Fill in High Volatility Regimes
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC gaps up >3% on daily open (compared to previous close) during NEUTRAL or BULL regimes, and fails to hold the gap within the first 2 hours, price fills 70-90% of the gap within the next 8 trading hours with 75% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Gaps in crypto often represent overnight momentum that lacks sustained buying pressure. Early rejection suggests weak hands selling into strength. Gap fills are psychologically important price levels.
entry_conditions: BTC daily opening price > previous close by ≥3%
Price retraces into the gap within first 2 hours of trading
1-hour RSI(14) peaks above 75 then falls below 65

exit_conditions.take_profit: 85% of gap filled (measured from entry to pre-gap close)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: New high above opening gap level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Gaps remain unfilled (>50% of gap persists) after 24 hours in >40% of occurrences, indicating stronger momentum than hypothesized.
